goal.en: Solving problems of 2D and 3D elastic solid structures
goal.ch: Solving problems of 2D and 3D elastic solid structures

content.en:
"1. LINEAR ELASTICITY
Stress and strain, Hook‘s law, plane stress and plane strain, differential equations of equilibrium, boundary conditions, compatibility equations, stress function, Saint-Venant‘s principle, solution of the two-dimensional problem in the form of a Fourier series, two-dimensional problems in polar coordinates, principle of virtual work, Torsion.
2. NON-LINEAR ELASTICITY(101.11.27更新)
Deformation gradient, polar decomposition, right and left stretch tensor, Lagrangian and Eulerian striain, Cauchy stress, First and Second Piola-kirchhoff stress, laws of motion, hyperelastic materials, principle of objectivity, isotropic materials, representation of constitutive law, compressible and incompressible materials, neo-Hookean materials, Mooney-Rivlin materials, Ogden materials, Blatz-Ko materials, growth of a micro-void."
content.ch:
"1. 線彈性力學
Stress and strain, Hook‘s law, plane stress and plane strain, differential equations of equilibrium, boundary conditions, compatibility equations, stress function, Saint-Venant‘s principle, solution of the two-dimensional problem in the form of a Fourier series, two-dimensional problems in polar coordinates, principle of virtual work, Torsion.
2. 非線性彈性力學(101.11.27更新)
Deformation gradient, polar decomposition, right and left stretch tensor, Lagrangian and Eulerian striain, Cauchy stress, First and Second Piola-kirchhoff stress, laws of motion, hyperelastic materials, principle of objectivity, isotropic materials, representation of constitutive law, compressible and incompressible materials, neo-Hookean materials, Mooney-Rivlin materials, Ogden materials, Blatz-Ko materials, growth of a micro-void."

textbook.en:
"1. Timoshenko and Goodier, Theory of Elasticity, 1970, McGraw-Hill.
2. R. W. Ogden, Non-Linear Elastic Deformations, 1984, Ellis Horwood"
textbook.ch:
"1. Timoshenko and Goodier, Theory of Elasticity, 1970, McGraw-Hill.
2. R. W. Ogden, Non-Linear Elastic Deformations, 1984, Ellis Horwood."
